name: SSF6
title: Site-Specific Factor 6
subtitle: Fuhrman Nuclear Grade
notes:
**Note 1:**  Fuhrman nuclear grade is a four-grade system based on nuclear diameter and shape, the prominence of nucleoli, and the presence of chromatin clumping in the highest grade. 

**Note 2:**  Record the Fuhrman nuclear grade as documented in the pathology report prior to neoadjuvant treatment.
rows: Not applicable: Not a renal cell carcinoma morphology
